casename.name: ChumBonus
casename.des: ChumBonus is changing the way jobs are found and people are hired on the Internet. This unique success-based service brings the best approach to job seeking to life-referrals. It is an online job employment web site that incents people (referrers) to find jobs for their friends (chums) for a reward (bonus). Clients use the power of the internet to find the right candidates.

casename.name: Decoded
casename.des: The design concept of the decoded based on the graphical encoding of words. This creates generative figures, which represent the names of speakers, mottoes and other texts in new ways. I made the four seasons by decoded.

casename.name: Budget Stacker Tool
casename.des: This application is an illustrative guide (or like a wizard tool), allowing the consumers to describe their current expenses in a visually attractive way. Next, the application automatically categorizes the consumer to a predefined profile and displays comparisons between some standard/ideal money expense profile and the consumer's current one.This application provides lots of tips, actions and advices on how to optimize consumer's regular expenses. These tips and advices are graphically illustrated and they visually inform the consumer about several ways to achieve better financial status by saving on some trivial things like replacing morning premium coffee with a bowl of milk and cereal.

casename.name: River Analytical
casename.des: It is a statistical/analytical consulting company that provides business insight into consumer shopping and marketing data. River Analytics was started to help companies analize and optimize their marketing activites to help drive sales.'River' came from passion for bring several areas (IT, data, analytics, reporting, web, and insight sot the client) of the company to a common single location. 'Analytics' came from primary focus of using statistical techniques to bridge the gap between the data and the client.

casename.name: Equitrader
casename.des: Equitrader is the online arena for stock trading competitions. Using a competitive environment, Equitrader seeks trading talent that can consistently out perform their peers and the overall market. This is accomplished through realistic trading simulation that supports stocks listed on NYSE, AMEX & NASDAQ. Prize money is given to competitors who perform the best.

casename.name: Voting
casename.des: This widget allows a user to vote for one (1) of the two (2) contest submissions displayed side-by-side. Once a vote is cast, two different submissions are randomly displayed. This is repeated indefinitely.
